name: Saint Thomas More, The Original Stoner
attributes: Axe, dressed in a Lord Chancellor
patronage: Adopted children, Arlington, Virginia, civil servants, court clerks, difficult marriages, large families, Roman Catholic Diocese of Pensacola-Tallahassee
prayer: Give me the grace to long for Your holy sacraments, and especially to rejoice in the presence of Your body, sweet Savior Christ, in the holy sacrament of the altar. Amen.
